Package com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.util

Class DiceBag

java.lang.Object
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.util.DiceBag
public class DiceBag
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains utility methods to simulate rolling a variety of polyhedral dice, 4-sided, 6-sided, 8-sided, 10-sided, 12-sided, 20-sided, and 100-sided. The code of Program class is provided by the professor
Version:
Java 1.8.0
Author:
Simon Ao
Student ID:040983402
Section:CST8284-312
Update:2021-3-17
